titles.title: Electing certain Members to certain standing committees of the House of Representatives.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to without objection.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

term.name: House Committee on Education and the Workforce
House Committee on Science, Space, and Technology

bill.summary: 4/8/2014--Passed House without amendment. Elects specified Members to the following House Committees: (1) Education and the Workforce; and (2) Science, Space, and Technology.
